summary:
Carrier objective
I would like to cherish a demanding position in a leading company that will utilize my dedication, creativity and skills and enhance my experience; I would like also to work in an environment where performance is rewarded with new responsibilities, that will allow me to use my ability to work with people and take advantage of my knowledge of Russian and English languages.
Summary and qualification
Result oriented professional with experience in marketing, and customer service. Highly skilled in client relations, with keenness to quickly study & achieve organizational integration, with ability to quickly employ new ideas, concepts, methods and technologies for the advancement of the company as well as for my own career. My high energy level is fluxed with excellent interpersonal and communication skills has helped me to work well with all layers of the organization and in achieving more than the committed targets.
